 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָאֵן‎</span> **verb Pi\`el** ==refuse== (**Qal** ==perhaps== ***be distasteful***, compare Syr, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***taeduit, piguit***, Aph\`el ***be slothful***; Late Hebrew Pi\`el, as term, techn. of girl, ***refuse*** to acknowledge marriage contract; possibly akin to Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***reject***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***sustain, maintain***); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאֵן‎</span> [[Exod.7.14|Exod 7:14]] + 4 t.; feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאֲנָה‎</span> [[Jer.15.18|Jer 15:18]] + 3 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאַנְתָּ‎</span> [[Exod.10.3|Exod 10:3]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְמָאֵן‎</span> [[Exod.22.16|Exod 22:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְמָאֵן‎</span> [[Gen.37.35|Gen 37:35]] + 8 t. etc.; ***Inf.*** abs <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָאֵן‎</span> [[Exod.22.16|Exod 22:16]] — ***refuse***, (followed by Infinitive except 6 t. see below) human subject [[Gen.37.35|Gen 37:35]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Jer.31.15|Jer 31:15]]; [[Exod.22.17|Exod 22:17]] (twice in verse); [[Num.20.21|Num 20:21]]; [[Num.22.14|Num 22:14]] (all [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.25.7|Deut 25:7]]; [[1Sam.8.19|1Sam 8:19]]; [[2Sam.2.23|2Sam 2:23]]; [[2Sam.13.9|2Sam 13:9]]; [[1Kgs.20.35|1Kgs 20:35]]; [[1Kgs.21.15|1Kgs 21:15]]; [[Esth.1.12|Esth 1:12]]; [[Jer.50.33|Jer 50:33]] compare [[Job.6.7|Job 6:7]]; [[Ps.77.3|Ps 77:3]]; [[Prov.21.25|Prov 21:25]]; [[Jer.15.18|Jer 15:18]] without Infinitive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְמָאֵן וַיּאֹמֶר‎</span> [[Gen.39.8|Gen 39:8]]; [[Gen.48.19|Gen 48:19]] (both [[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.28.23|1Sam 28:23]]; also [[2Kgs.5.16|2Kgs 5:16]] especially of refusing to obey <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s commands [[Exod.4.23|Exod 4:23]]; [[Exod.7.14|Exod 7:14]]; [[Exod.10.3|Exod 10:3]]; [[Exod.16.28|Exod 16:28]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Neh.9.17|Neh 9:17]] also [[Ps.78.10|Ps 78:10]]; [[Prov.21.7|Prov 21:7]]; [[Hos.11.5|Hos 11:5]], see especially [[Jer.3.3|Jer 3:3]]; [[Jer.5.3|Jer 5:3]] (twice in verse); [[Jer.8.5|Jer 8:5]]; [[Jer.9.5|Jer 9:5]]; [[Jer.11.10|Jer 11:10]] compare [[Jer.25.28|Jer 25:28]]; [[Zech.7.11|Zech 7:11]] without Infinitive = ***be recusant*** [[Prov.1.24|Prov 1:24]]; [[Isa.1.20|Isa 1:20]] once subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Num.22.13|Num 22:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]).
